00002 /// @file         CTreeNodeMover.cpp

00018 #include <QApplication>
00019 #include <QMouseEvent>

00021 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00022 /// CTreeNodeMover::CTreeNodeMover
00023 ///
00024 /// @description  This is the default constructor for the CTreeNodeMover class.
00025 ///               It initializes member variables.
00026 /// @pre          None
00027 /// @post         Member variables are initialized.
00028 ///
00029 /// @limitations  None
00030 ///
00031 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00032 CTreeNodeMover::CTreeNodeMover( QObject *parent )
00033 : QObject( parent )
00034 {
00035     m_style = CStyleToolkit::instance();
00036 
00037     m_selNode = NULL;
00038 }

00055 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00056 /// CTreeNodeMover::canvasMouseEvent
00057 ///
00058 /// @description   This function handles any mouse events which are passed
00059 ///                in from the tree graph view.  Mouse events include mouse
00060 ///                clicks, mouse movements, and mouse button releases.
00061 /// @pre           None
00062 /// @post          None
00063 ///
00064 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the QMouseEvent which triggered this
00065 ///                call.
00066 ///
00067 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the event is used and false otherwise.
00068 ///
00069 /// @limitations   None
00070 ///
00071 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00072 bool CTreeNodeMover::canvasMouseEvent( QMouseEvent *e )
00073 {
00074     switch( e->type() )
00075     {
00076     case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
00077         return mousePress( e );
00078     case QEvent::MouseMove:
00079         return mouseMove( e );
00080     case QEvent::MouseButtonRelease:
00081         return mouseRelease( e );
00082     default:
00083         return false;
00084     }
00085     return false;
00086 }
00087 
00088 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00089 /// CTreeNodeMover::isMoving
00090 ///
00091 /// @description   This function returns true if there is a node currently
00092 ///                selected and being moved.
00093 /// @pre           None
00094 /// @post          None
00095 ///
00096 /// @return bool:  Returns true if a node is currently being moved.
00097 ///
00098 /// @limitations   None
00099 ///
00100 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00101 bool CTreeNodeMover::isMoving()
00102 {
00103     return ( m_mouseDown && m_selNode != NULL );
00104 }
00105 
00106 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00107 /// CTreeNodeMover::mouseMove
00108 ///
00109 /// @description   This function handles mouse move events.
00110 /// @pre           None
00111 /// @post          None
00112 ///
00113 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the QMouseEvent which triggered this
00114 ///                call.
00115 ///
00116 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the mouse move event was used and false
00117 ///                otherwise.
00118 ///
00119 /// @limitations   None
00120 ///
00121 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00122 bool CTreeNodeMover::mouseMove( QMouseEvent *e )
00123 {
00124     //Check if a node is currently being moved and edit its position if it is.
00125     if( isMoving() )
00126     {
00127         if( QApplication::keyboardModifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier )
00128             m_model->editSubTreePosition(m_selNode, e->pos() + m_dragOffset);
00129         else
00130             m_model->editNodePosition(m_selNode, e->pos() + m_dragOffset);
00131         return true;
00132     }
00133     return false;
00134 }
00135 
00136 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00137 /// CTreeNodeMover::mousePress
00138 ///
00139 /// @description   This function handles mouse button press events.
00140 /// @pre           None
00141 /// @post          None
00142 ///
00143 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the QMouseEvent which triggered this
00144 ///                call.
00145 ///
00146 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the mouse button press event was used and
00147 ///                false otherwise.
00148 ///
00149 /// @limitations   None
00150 ///
00151 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00152 bool CTreeNodeMover::mousePress( QMouseEvent *e )
00153 {
00154     //Check if the left mouse button was pressed.
00155     if( e->button() == Qt::LeftButton )
00156     {
00157         //Find if there was a node where the user clicked.
00158         m_selNode = m_model->findNode( e->pos() );
00159 
00160         //Check if a node was found.  If one was, calculate the offset from the
00161         //center of the node to location clicked and indicate the node is being
00162         //moved.
00163         if( m_selNode != NULL )
00164         {
00165             m_dragOffset = m_selNode->s_position - e->pos();
00166             m_mouseDown = true;
00167             return true;
00168         }
00169     }
00170     return false;
00171 }
00172 
00173 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00174 /// CTreeNodeMover::mouseRelease
00175 ///
00176 /// @description   This function handles mouse button release events.
00177 /// @pre           None
00178 /// @post          None
00179 ///
00180 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the QMouseEvent which trigged this
00181 ///                call.
00182 ///
00183 /// @return bool:  Returns false always.  This works as a cancel or done
00184 ///                function.  Returning false allows other objects to use this
00185 ///                mouse event.
00186 ///
00187 /// @limitations   None
00188 ///
00189 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00190 bool CTreeNodeMover::mouseRelease( QMouseEvent *e )
00191 {
00192     //Check if there was a node being used or not.  If there was, release it
00193     //and signal that the moving is done.
00194     if ( isMoving() )
00195     {
00196         m_selNode = NULL;
00197         m_mouseDown = false;
00198         emit done();
00199         return true;
00200     }
00201 
00202     return false;
00203 }
00204 
00205 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00206 /// CTreeNodeMover::setModel
00207 ///
00208 /// @description   This function sets the member variable pointer to the model
00209 ///                so editing functions may be called when a node is moved.
00210 /// @pre           None
00211 /// @post          The model pointer is updated.
00212 ///
00213 /// @param model:  This is a pointer to the tree graph model.
00214 ///
00215 /// @limitations   None
00216 ///
00217 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00218 void CTreeNodeMover::setModel( CTreeGraphModel *model )
00219 {
00220     m_model = model;
00221 }
